game.title: MURDOKU
game.subtitle: Logic Puzzle: Place the 4 suspects. Only one per row and one per column. Follow the clues to find their true locations.
game.coordinateNote: Note: Rows are 1-4 (Top to Bottom). Columns are 1-4 (Left to Right).

messages.won: Case Closed! All suspects located correctly.
messages.invalidPlacement: Invalid placement! Suspects cannot share a row or column.
messages.checkClues: Evidence doesn't match... check your clues again.

cluePatterns.object: {suspect} was found at the location with {article} {object}.
cluePatterns.objectInRow: {suspect} is in row {position} where there is {article} {object}.
cluePatterns.objectInColumn: {suspect} is in column {position} where there is {object}.
cluePatterns.objectPair: {suspect} was found at the location with {article1} {object1} and {article2} {object2}.
